body_html: As @asimshankar mentioned, @Defun is experimental and has a number of features missing including shape propagation. This feature is on our radar but it is currently not high enough priority for us to know a rough timeline for its completion.
body_text: As @asimshankar mentioned, @Defun is experimental and has a number of features missing including shape propagation. This feature is on our radar but it is currently not high enough priority for us to know a rough timeline for its completion.
body: As @asimshankar mentioned, `@Defun` is experimental and has a number of features missing including shape propagation. This feature is on our radar but it is currently not high enough priority for us to know a rough timeline for its completion.
